id: scenario-value-scanner-middle-aged-scenarios-individual-health monitoring as robert recognizes his own aging
title: Health monitoring as Robert recognizes his own aging
description: Health monitoring as Robert recognizes his own aging
content:
Scenario: Health monitoring as Robert recognizes his own aging
    Given Robert is experiencing early signs of aging
    And he watches his parents navigate health challenges
    And he recognizes his own future care needs
    When Robert tracks his health through his personal_agent
    Then it should monitor age-related health indicators
    And help him establish preventive health practices
    And connect his parents' health patterns to his own future
    And support planning for his own eventual care needs
    And recognize: "Regular exercise now reduces future care burden"
    And help him build health practices that will serve him as he ages
    And prepare him for the transition from care provider to care receiver
